Careers

We believe a strong team shares common goals and values. We are proud to not have a go-to stack and we are united in our passion to never stop challenging ourselves. If you share these beliefs, we might have been looking just for you.

Learn more

Perks & Benefits

What you can expect from working at code & co.

  • 01

    Steep Learning Curve

    Throw yourself in the deep end, surrounded by support. Learn it all, from consulting to growing a digital venture.

  • 02

    Funded Development

    As a fully bootstrapped company, we have the luxury to experiment. If you identify an opportunity, together, we can bring it live.

  • 03

    Choose Your Hardware

    We use technology to produce impactful work and we’ll make sure your utility belt is up to the challenges of every day.

  • 04

    Flexible Working Hours

    Output matters and just that. You will be measured by your work and not by b/s politics that involve "face time" or similar measures.

  • 05

    Flexible Vacation Policy

    We value you and we require your best work. We want to make sure you’re physically and mentally in a state to provide your greatest input.

  • 06

    Central Berlin Office

    Our central office at Rosenthaler Platz is right at the center of start-up dreams and Berlin itself is a fun and beautiful city to live in.

  • 07

    Food and Drinks

    We all perform best when we enjoy being at work. Snacks, coffee and regular team lunches keep us on point throughout the day.

  • 08

    Education Budget

    We believe in life-long learning. Each employee has a generous education budget they can use for leveling up.

  • 09

    BE YOURSELF

    We’re an international team with a diverse skill set. Every day we come together to make everyone’s input heard, seen – and built.

Software & Product Apprenticeships

We feel it is important to give back to an industry that has been inclusive, supportive and encouraging for us while starting out. For junior level hires, we predominately look for accelerated learners rather than hard manifested skills.

Get in Touch

If you’d like to learn more about what we do, please don’t hesitate to reach out.
